Projects

Where Are The Events

An API hack that takes Meetup results and combines Google Maps to place the markers. Two API's were used in this project. I used Bower, NPM, and Gulp for my build tools.

Places

A quiz app where the answers are all countries around the world.

Shopping List

A flat designed shopping list to-do app built with jquery
